resources.string: Please enter a word to make a search!

To search information about a word, click on Search button and enter the word to be searched. You will get a list of related words. 
Click on particular word to view detailed information. 

You can save the word details offline on the detail page, click on Save offline button to do so. 

To view saved words click on Saved button, the list of saved words will be displayed, click on particular word to view it's detailed information.
Please enter topic name to get results!
Type a topic name to view articles…

To search for a news, click on Search button and enter the keyword. You will get a list of related news articles. 
Click on particular article to view detailed information. 

You can save the article details offline on the detail page, click on Save offline button to do so. 

To view saved articles click on Saved button, the list of saved articles will be displayed, click on particular article to view it's detailed information.
